page.title: 12Education In Mayfield.
page.content: Mayfield has several educational establishments.Firstly there is the Church of England Primary School which has about 90 pupils & 4 teaching staff.As a village school it caters for local children aged 4_11 years & is actively involved in community affairs.Across the road from the Primary School there is a private Convent School run by nuns of the order of The Society of The Holy Child Jesus,which dates back to 1872.The school takes about 520 day_girls & boarders aged 11_18 years.Girls from all over the world attend the Convent. Mayfield College is a boys Public School for boys aged 11_18 years.Like the Convent the boys come from many different countries.Finally there is a small residential school for children referred by various local authorities.
